title: Apprentice Felix

properties.value: Apprentice Felix is a wizard apprenticed to Wizard Traiborn, he can be found on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] of the Wizards' Tower. After the player has completed the quest Temple of the Eye, he can be found in the Temple of the Eye. Players can purchase unique Runecraft gear from his shop in exchange for abyssal pearls earned from the Guardians of the Rift minigame.

Apprentice Felix is a wizard apprenticed to Wizard Traiborn, he can be found on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] of the Wizards' Tower. After the player has completed the quest Temple of the Eye, he can be found in the Temple of the Eye. Players can purchase unique Runecraft gear from his shop in exchange for abyssal pearls earned from the Guardians of the Rift minigame.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
30 March 2022
(update)

The amount of Abyssal pearls required to purchase pieces of the Raiments of the Eye outfit from Felix's shop has been reduced:

  • Hat of the eye (reduced from 500 to 400)
  • Robe top of the eye (reduced from 400 to 350)
  • Robe bottoms of the eye (reduced from 400 to 350)
  • Boots of the eye (reduced from 300 to 250)
